text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Procedure I0..*USCoreProcedureProfileAn action that is being or was performed on a patient
mcode-reason-required: One of reasonCode or reasonReference SHALL be present
Slices for extension S0..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url
mcode-procedure-intent S0..1CodeableConceptProcedure Intent Extension
URL: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/mcode/StructureDefinition/mcode-procedure-intent
Binding: Procedure Intent Value Set (required)
mcode-treatment-termination-reason S0..1CodeableConceptTreatment Termination Reason Extension
URL: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/mcode/StructureDefinition/mcode-treatment-termination-reason
Binding: Treatment Termination Reason Value Set (required)
mcode-radiotherapy-modality-and-technique S0..*(Complex)Radiotherapy Modality And Technique Extension
URL: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/mcode/StructureDefinition/mcode-radiotherapy-modality-and-technique
mcode-radiotherapy-sessions S0..1unsignedIntRadiotherapy Number of Sessions Extension
URL: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/mcode/StructureDefinition/mcode-radiotherapy-sessions
mcode-radiotherapy-dose-delivered-to-volume S0..*(Complex)Radiotherapy Dose Delivered To Volume Extension
URL: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/mcode/StructureDefinition/mcode-radiotherapy-dose-delivered-to-volume
category S1..1CodeableConceptClassification of the procedure
Required Pattern: At least the following
coding1..*CodingCode defined by a terminology system
Fixed Value: (complex)
system1..1uriIdentity of the terminology system
Fixed Value: http://snomed.info/sct
code1..1codeSymbol in syntax defined by the system
Fixed Value: 108290001
code 1..1CodeableConceptIdentification of the procedure
Required Pattern: At least the following
coding1..*CodingCode defined by a terminology system
Fixed Value: (complex)
system1..1uriIdentity of the terminology system
Fixed Value: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/mcode/CodeSystem/snomed-tbd-cs
code1..1codeSymbol in syntax defined by the system
Fixed Value: USCRS-33292
subject 1..1Reference(Cancer Patient Profile)Who the procedure was performed on
performed[x] 1..1PeriodWhen the procedure was performed
reasonCode S0..*CodeableConceptCoded reason procedure performed
Binding: Cancer Disorder Value Set (extensible)
reasonReference S0..*Reference(Primary Cancer Condition Profile | Secondary Cancer Condition Profile)The justification that the procedure was performed
bodySite S0..*CodeableConceptAll body structure(s) treated
Binding: Radiotherapy Treatment Location Value Set (required)

Documentation for this format

name: VGHKSRadiotherapyCourseSummaryRadio1
title: VGHKS Radiotherapy Course Summary Radio1 Profile
description: A summary of a course of radiotherapy delivered to a patient. It records the treatment intent, termination reason, modalities, techniques, number of sessions, and doses delivered to one or more body volumes. Whether the course has been fully delivered or stopped is indicated in the status element.

constraint.human: One of reasonCode or reasonReference SHALL be present

element.short: [最高放射劑量臨床標靶體積]
[最高放射劑量臨床標靶體積劑量]
[較低放射劑量臨床標靶體積]
[其他放射治療臨床標靶體積]
[preparation | in-progress | not-done | on-hold | stopped | completed | entered-in-error | unknown]請填入(completed)
放射治療與手術順序,區域治療與全身性治療順序

element.definition:
A symbol in syntax defined by the system. The symbol may be a predefined code or an expression in a syntax defined by the coding system (e.g. post-coordination).
coding[0].code請填入USCRS-33529

element.short: [Radiotherapy Course of Treatment (regime/therapy),放射治療與手術順序,放射治療與手術順序]
element.definition:
A representation of the meaning of the code in the system, following the rules of the system.
coding[0].display請輸入Radiotherapy Course of Treatment (regime/therapy)
coding[1].display請輸入放射治療與手術順序
coding[2].display請輸入放射治療與手術順序

Indicates that this coding was chosen by a user directly - e.g. off a pick list of available items (codes or displays).
coding[0].userSelected請輸入FALSE
coding[1].userSelected請輸入True
coding[2].userSelected請輸入True

Estimated or actual date, date-time, period, or age when the procedure was performed.  Allows a period to support complex procedures that span more than one date, and also allows for the length of the procedure to be captured.

performedPeriod.star-放射治療開始日期
performedPeriod.end-放射治療結束日期

The start of the period. The boundary is inclusive.
放射治療開始日期

The end of the period. If the end of the period is missing, it means no end was known or planned at the time the instance was created. The start may be in the past, and the end date in the future, which means that period is expected/planned to end at that time.
放射治療結束日期

Coded body structure(s) treated in this course of radiotherapy. These codes represent general locations. For additional detail, refer to the BodyStructures references in the doseDeliveredToVolume extension.

element.short: [放射治療臨床標靶體積摘要]
[放射治療儀器, 其他放射治療儀器]
[放射治療儀器, 其他放射治療儀器]
